mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Profile (curatorId, title, introduction) VALUES (#{curatorId}, #{title}, #{introduction});
mapper.select: SELECT profile.profileId, profile.curatorId, profile.title, profile.introduction, career.careerId, career.company, career.companyTitle, academic.academicId, academic.name, academic.major FROM Profile LEFT JOIN Curator ON profile.curatorId = curator.id LEFT JOIN Career ON profile.profileId = career.profileId LEFT JOIN Academic ON profile.profileId = career.profileId WHERE profile.curatorId = #{curatorId};
SELECT exists(SELECT 1 FROM Profile WHERE curatorId = #{curatorId});
